channel.title: Comments on: “Please sir, can I have some more?” – shiny hardware and .NET
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Tahir Khalid
item.dc:creator: Tahir Khalid
item.description: Robert the HP 8560w is actually very quiet in use and under heavy load it's louder but not in a distracting way like my PC was/is - with the HP I am still able to stay relatively sane and do my work!
item.content:encoded: Robert the HP 8560w is actually very quiet in use and under heavy load it’s louder but not in a distracting way like my PC was/is – with the HP I am still able to stay relatively sane and do my work!

item.title: By: Tahir Khalid
item.dc:creator: Tahir Khalid
item.description: Thanks Eric, haha I will leave Oliver with the original.
item.content:encoded: Thanks Eric, haha I will leave Oliver with the original.

item.title: By: Eric Taylor
item.dc:creator: Eric Taylor
item.description: Great article! Just so you know, though, Oliver actually said: "Please, sir, I want some more." He was most brazen!
item.content:encoded: Great article! Just so you know, though, Oliver actually said: “Please, sir, I want some more.” He was most brazen!

item.title: By: Robert
item.dc:creator: Robert
item.description:
"over a noisy but powerful desktop workstation" ...
funny you say that, because my laptop makes more noise than my powerful desktop workstation (but I cannot move the desktop around the house easily ...)
item.content:encoded:
“over a noisy but powerful desktop workstation” …

funny you say that, because my laptop makes more noise than my powerful desktop workstation (but I cannot move the desktop around the house easily …)
